Key Match Events: Robbie Grossman hit a two-run single in the 6th inning, scoring Perez and Gurriel.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game went into the bottom of the 9th inning with the Royals leading 3-0.
Michael Lorenzen started but left early in the game.
Five Kansas City relievers pitched 6 2/3 innings of two-hit ball.
